Jim Webber wrote:
>  > I do agree that using something like XML schema to enforce a
>  > contract might be an interesting idea.
> 
> Doh! I never meant to imply that. A media type might have a bunch of
> schemas associated with it, but it's the media type spec that declares
> the contract.
> 

You don't think a media type spec could use a schema to define a contract?

i.e.

application/vnd.order+xml

Its the only ammunition/answer I've thought of when I get the question 
"Where's the WSDL?"

Bill
